content.description: Python interpreter (2016 Fall, Final, Question 15 b)

p.line: Interpreter fun! For each, choose ONE that best matches what would display on the next line.
Note that some of the code might have bugs! We include “Error” and “None of these” in case the output is not what is expected.
_SPACE__GT__GT__GT__BOLDS__SPACE__SPACE_ [N ** 2 for N in range(4) if N != 2]_BOLDE_

content.hint: range(4) returns [0,1,2,3], and ** means squre. You can test it out using python interprete.
